Marko Bjelonic

Marko Bjelonic is a robotics researcher focusing on motion control and planning for wheeled-legged robots in rough terrain.

Welcome to my website!

I am robotics researcher at the Robotic System Lab of ETH Zurich focusing on motion control and planning for wheeled-legged robots in rough terrain.
